mapper.sql: moneyflowid AS id ,mau_userid AS mauUserId ,mag_groupid AS magGroupId ,bookingdate ,invoicedate ,amount ,mcs_capitalsourceid AS mcsCapitalsourceId ,mcp_contractpartnerid AS mcpContractpartnerId ,comment ,mpa_postingaccountid AS mpaPostingAccountId ,private AS privat
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT TO_CHAR(bookingdate, 'YYYY') FROM vw_moneyflows WHERE mar_mau_userid = #{userId} AND (private = 0 OR mau_userid = #{userId}) ORDER BY 1
SELECT MAX(bookingdate) FROM vw_moneyflows WHERE mar_mau_userid = #{userId} AND (private = 0 OR mau_userid = #{userId})

SELECT mmf.moneyflowid AS id ,mmf.mau_userid AS mauUserId ,mmf.mag_groupid AS magGroupId ,mmf.bookingdate AS bookingdate ,mmf.invoicedate AS invoicedate ,COALESCE(mse.amount,mmf.amount) AS amount ,mmf.mcs_capitalsourceid AS mcsCapitalsourceId ,mmf.mcp_contractpartnerid AS mcpContractpartnerId ,COALESCE(mse.comment,mmf.comment) AS comment ,COALESCE(mse.mpa_postingaccountid,mmf.mpa_postingaccountid) AS mpaPostingAccountId ,mmf.private AS privat FROM vw_moneyflows mmf LEFT OUTER JOIN moneyflowsplitentries mse ON mmf.moneyflowid = mse.mmf_moneyflowid WHERE
COALESCE(mse.comment, mmf.comment)
UPPER(COALESCE(mse.comment, mmf.comment))
=
~
LIKE
#{searchString}
UPPER(#{searchString})
AND
mmf.bookingdate BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} AND mmf.mar_mau_userid = #{userId} AND ( mmf.private = 0 OR mmf.mau_userid = #{userId} )
AND COALESCE(mse.amount, mmf.amount) < 0
AND mmf.mcp_contractpartnerid = #{contractpartnerId}
AND COALESCE(mse.mpa_postingaccountid, mmf.mpa_postingaccountid) = #{postingAccountId}
